benchmark_details.name: FOFO (Format-Following Benchmark)
benchmark_details.overview: FOFO is a benchmark for evaluating large language models' ability to follow complex, domain-specific formats, which is crucial for their application as AI agents. It tests LLMs on various real-world format requirements and instructions.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the format-following capability of large language models in various domains.

data.source: Developed through an AI-Human collaborative method.
data.annotation: Generated and verified by human experts.

methodology.calculation: Evaluated as a binary classification problem with detailed explanations.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better format-following capability of models.
methodology.validation: Evaluated against both automated metrics and human judgments.
